Medocs._getMedocsList ( $  nr,
$  nr_type = '_ENC' 
)

Gets all medocs documents based on the given key number.

The type of key number is determined by the content of the $nr_type parameter.

The returned adodb record object contains rows of arrays. Each array contains the encounter data with the following index keys:

  • nr = record's primary key number
  • encounter_nr = encounter number
  • date= date of documentation
  • time = time of documentation
  • notes = the document text
  • is_discharged = discharge status of encounter

private

Parameters:
int Key number
string Type of key number. '_ENC' = encounter nr, '_REG' = pid nr.
Returns:
mixed adodb record object or boolean

Medocs.getMedocsDocument ( $  nr  ) 

Gets medocs document based on a field "nr" key

The returned array has the following keys: diagnosis = Diagnosis text short_notes = Short diagnosis notes aux_notes = Auxilliary notes date = Date of creation time = Time of creation personell_nr = Personnel number who created the document personell_name = Personnel name therapy = Therapy text public

Parameters:
int document number
Returns:
mixed array or boolean
